ECSchema.description: Catalog schema contains only the Catalog specific Classes and Properties

ECClass.description: For now this class has not been drawn from ISO 15926 but eventually that will be inherited from there
This will be Bentley Specific class, it allows to define a single relationship between Catalogue and Piping, Electrical and Equipment type of components
Will be derived from ISO 15926 Dictionary, contains catalogue specific Electrical Component properites
Will be derived from ISO 15926 Dictionary, contains catalogue specific equipment properites
This class indicates the type of facing

ECProperty.description: A designation for the measuring units in which a numerical value is expressed

ECClass.description: This class indicates the type of material
Will be derived from ISO 15926 Dictionary, contains catalogue specific Piping properites

ECProperty.description: A designation for the measuring units in which a numerical value is expressed

type of facing of a flanged end
a pressure under which an object is expected to operate
a temperature under which an object is expected to operate.
